name: City Loop
description:
City Loop

Two trains are STUCK in the CITY LOOP. Keep them both running and collecting cargo for as long as you can.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Click on junctions to switch their direction.
  • For the safety of passengers, junctions cannot be switched while in use.
  • Collect cargo to earn points, but avoid crashing the trains!

Vote for our game over at ldjam.com
